channel.title: Guzel Sanzhapova on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Guzel Sanzhapova on Rusland 1

item.title: Dead or Reviving: Russian Villages
item.description: Presented in order of release. Lost A somber depiction of the потерянное богатство страны, the lost wealth of the nation. ‘How Russia is dying.’ Subtitles available in settings. Как погибает Россия. Разруха, воровство и смерть в русской деревне (Varlamov, 16-04-2020, 48 m)
